execution_plan.description: Retrieve distinct sold items and the receipt they belong to from the items database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT Receipt, Item FROM items;

execution_plan.description: Get prices for the goods referenced by the items retrieved in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, price FROM goods WHERE id IN ($step1.Item);

execution_plan.description: Get receipt-to-customer mapping for receipts referenced by the items retrieved in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT ReceiptNumber, CustomerId FROM receipts WHERE ReceiptNumber IN ($step1.Receipt);
